name: youtube_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on YouTube in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling youtube_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'react tutorial,vue tutorial,angular tutorial'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'python basics,javascript basics,rust basics')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const renderers = document.querySelectorAll('ytd-video-renderer'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(renderers.length, 5); i++) { const el = renderers[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('#video-title'); const channelEl = el.querySelector('ytd-channel-name #text a, ytd-channel-name #text'); const metaItems = el.querySelectorAll('#metadata-line span.inline-metadata-item, #metadata-line span'); const views = metaItems[0] ? metaItems[0].textContent.trim() : ''; const uploaded = metaItems[1] ? metaItems[1].textContent.trim() : ''; const durationEl = el.querySelector('badge-shape .badge-shape-wiz__text, ytd-thumbnail-overlay-time-status-renderer span'); const linkEl = titleEl; const href = linkEl ? linkEl.getAttribute('href') : ''; results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', channel: channelEl ? channelEl.textContent.trim() : '', views: views, uploaded: uploaded, duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: href ? 'https://www.youtube.com' + href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('search_query') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
